attributes.action: remove prison sentances for those convicted of possesion of drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who take drugs are not criminals they are sick, I implore the prime minister to impose more severe punishments for those who are dealing drugs and to enforce rehabilitation regimes (such as mandatory attendance of court ordered rehabilitaion centres and membership rehabilitation organisations) for those caught using drugs. This is not endorsing decriminalising drugs, instead just take people who have made bad decisions and put them on the right track rather than placing them in an entirely unsuitable environment for rehabilitation.
